codeSystems.name: CareTeamStatus
codeSystems.title: CareTeamStatus
codeSystems.description: Indicates the status of the care team.

codeSystems.name: Condition/DiagnosisSeverity
codeSystems.title: Condition/Diagnosis Severity
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for Condition/Diagnosis severity grading.

codeSystems.name: MedicationAdministration Status Codes
codeSystems.title: Medication administration  status  codes
codeSystems.description: MedicationAdministration Status Codes

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

codeSystems.name: ParticipantRoles
codeSystems.title: Participant Roles
codeSystems.description: Roles of participants that may be included in a care team.  Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).

codeSystems.name: PublicationStatus
codeSystems.title: PublicationStatus
codeSystems.description: The lifecycle status of an artifact.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTRouteCodes
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Route Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all Route codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar.

codeSystems.name: AddressUseVSTWLTC
codeSystems.title: 地址用途擴展值集
codeSystems.description: 地址的用途，新增戶籍地與現居地等代碼

codeSystems.title: 身心障礙類型值集

codeSystems.title: 身心障礙手冊持有狀況值集
codeSystems.description: 個案持有身心障礙手冊的狀況

codeSystems.name: ConditionSeverityVSTWLTC
codeSystems.title: 疾病嚴重度擴展值集
codeSystems.description: 用以表述疾病嚴重度之擴展值集，包含疾病嚴重度之描述內容。配合身心障礙手冊障礙程度分級，包含輕度、中度、重度、極重度等代碼。

codeSystems.name: EconomyStatusVSTWLTC
codeSystems.title: 個案經濟狀況值集
codeSystems.description: 用以表述個案經濟狀況之值集，包含個案經濟狀況之描述內容。
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-ExtPatientEconomySta: 長照機構住民經濟狀況

codeSystems.name: EducationStatusVSTWLTC
codeSystems.title: 教育程度值集
codeSystems.description: 用以表述教育程度之值集，包含教育程度之描述內容。
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-ExtPatientEducationS: 長照機構住民教育程度

codeSystems.name: GoalDescriptionVSTWLTC
codeSystems.title: 照顧目標描述值集
codeSystems.description: 照顧目標的描述值集，用以表述長期照顧情境中涉及之照顧目標描述內容。本值集比照 US Core Goal Profile 中的 description 元素定義，引用 SNOMED CT 與 LOINC 等術語系統。
